title: Ep. 116 - Blitzen's Fated Mate by RE Butler
itunes:title: Ep. 116 - Blitzen's Fated Mate by RE Butler
description:
Hey HBs! Erin is joined by friend and HB Karen to recap Blitzen's Fated Mate by RE Butler! It's a holiday shifter novella that involves the newest Blitzen on the sleigh team, a fall from the sky, and the romance-writing-fated-mate who finds him in the woods. YES. It's delightfully bonkers and we are here for it. Karen is especially here for it. 
 Episode Sponsor: 
 Wanna Bet by Betsy Dudak. Make sure you pick up this fabulous new contemporary! 
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Nora R, you are a Hippogriff. You are a powerful half-horse, half-eagle flying creature that is immensely proud and extremely dangerous. You are extremely magical and majestic, and you know your worth. If someone doesn't treat you with respect, you will murder them with your razor-sharp beaks and foot-long talons because they absolutely, unequivocally deserve it. So you prance around on land and soar through the sky, you shake your tail and you feathers and you keep showing the world your power and majesty. We crave it. We want to bow down. 
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

Hey HBs! Erin is joined by friend and HB Karen to recap Blitzen's Fated Mate by RE Butler! It's a holiday shifter novella that involves the newest Blitzen on the sleigh team, a fall from the sky, and the romance-writing-fated-mate who finds him in the woods. YES. It's delightfully bonkers and we are here for it. Karen is especially here for it. 

Episode Sponsor: 

Wanna Bet by Betsy Dudak. Make sure you pick up this fabulous new contemporary! 

Patreon Shout Out: 

Nora R, you are a Hippogriff. You are a powerful half-horse, half-eagle flying creature that is immensely proud and extremely dangerous. You are extremely magical and majestic, and you know your worth. If someone doesn't treat you with respect, you will murder them with your razor-sharp beaks and foot-long talons because they absolutely, unequivocally deserve it. So you prance around on land and soar through the sky, you shake your tail and you feathers and you keep showing the world your power and majesty. We crave it. We want to bow down.
